html:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - TIGER GLOBAL MANAGEMENT:

  • TIGER GLOBAL MANAGEMENT CUTS SHARE STAKE IN AMAZON BY 37.8% TO 353,292 SHARES

  • TIGER GLOBAL MANAGEMENT UPS SHARE STAKE IN PELOTON BY 41.9% TO 10.2 MILLION SHARES OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK

  • TIGER GLOBAL MANAGEMENT UPS SHARE STAKE IN CONFLUENT TO 3.9 MILLION SHARES OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK FROM 400,000 SHARES OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK

  • TIGER GLOBAL MANAGEMENT UPS SHARE STAKE IN LI AUTO INC TO 7.4 MILLION SPONSORED ADSS FROM 350,000 SPONSORED ADSS

  • TIGER GLOBAL MANAGEMENT CUTS SHARE STAKE IN WARBY PARKER INC TO 2.8 MILLION SHARES OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK FROM 15.1 MILLION SHARES OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK

Source for the quarter ended December 31, 2021: [https://bit.ly/3gMsJGh]


Sources for the quarter ended September 30, 2021: [https://bit.ly/3HlpK3X]
